level.heading: Address of licensed activity.
level.text: ยง 20-112 Address of licensed activity. Except as specifically provided in chapter two, a license shall be valid only for the location designated upon the application therefor, except in the case of licenses issued for activities which in their nature are carried out at large and not at a fixed place of business. No license shall be issued for more than one location. Licensees shall, at least ten days prior thereto, notify the commissioner or the commissioner's designee by registered or certified mail, or personal service, of any change of address of the licensed premises or of the residence of the licensee.
